item.title: Book Reviews
item.description:
Book Reviews

I found about 50 nonfiction books that look very interesting in my attic. My plan is to read them all throughout 2026, and write about them on this blog. You can find a list of all of them here.

I am almost finished with one of these books (Spiritual Disciplines for the Christian Life, by Donald Whitney). This will be my first review, which I’ll write pretty soon. My next book after that will be 9 Marks of a Healthy Church. We’ll see how long this series lasts, I hope to continue all year, but that will be hard.

item.title: First
item.description:
Hello World!

Hello everyone, my name is Oren Lindsey. This is my first post on my new blog. Hopefully this will be a place where I post often.
